pageProduct.name: Surf Life Saving SPF 50+ Daily 1 Litre
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Use Surf Lifesaving Daily sunscreens to provide your skin the regular defence it needs from the damaging and aging effects of the sun.

Warnings

If irratation develops, discontinue use

Common Uses

Sun protection

Ingredients

Octocrylene 20 mg/g, Butyl Methoxybenzoylmethane 50 mg/g, 4-Methylbenzylidene Camphor 40 mg/g, Bemotrizinol 5 mg/g

Directions

Apply liberally and evenly at least 15-20 mins before exposure to the sun
